abstract: BrightSource Energy will build 500 megawatts’ worth of solar thermal power plants for Pacific Gas & Electric in California, and the contract contains an option for PG&E to order another 400 megawatts on top of that.
lead_paragraph: BrightSource Energy will build 500 megawatts’ worth of solar thermal power plants for Pacific Gas & Electric in California, and the contract contains an option for PG&E to order another 400 megawatts on top of that.

headline.main: BrightSource Signs Solar Deal With PG&E
